families.noMembersAddedYetDescription: Add family members to coordinate communications, track relationships, and manage scheduling across the family.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your sacramental ministry at a glance
dashboard.noUpcomingEvents: No upcoming events in the next 30 days

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application preferences and manage your account
settings.userPreferencesDescription: Customize your language, liturgical preferences, and default settings.

events.title: Parish Events
events.description: Define event types for parish activities. Add custom fields, create printable scripts, and organize categories like Bible Study, Youth Group, or Parish Meetings.

specialLiturgies.title: Special Liturgies
specialLiturgies.description: Configure sacramental celebrations. Define custom fields for participant info, create ceremony scripts, and manage types like Weddings, Baptisms, Funerals, and Quinceañeras.

settings.eventTypesDescription: Define event type configurations for your parish. Each event type defines what data to collect and how to generate documents.
settings.customListsDescription: Manage custom lists for event field options like songs, readings, or locations.
settings.petitionSettingsDescription: Create reusable petition templates for Masses, Funerals, Weddings, and other liturgical occasions. Define prayers of the faithful for quick insertion.
settings.noPetitionTemplatesFoundMessage: No templates found matching your search.
settings.noPetitionTemplatesYetMessage: No templates yet. Create your first template!
settings.parishSettingsDescription: Update your parish name, address, contact information, and other administrative details that appear on printed documents.
settings.contentLibraryDescription: Manage reusable liturgical content like readings, prayers, and ceremony text.
settings.categoryTagsDescription: Manage tags for organizing and categorizing content and petitions (Admin only).
settings.eventTemplatesDescription: Manage reusable templates for events. Templates store pre-filled field values for quick event creation.
settings.createTemplateDescription: Templates are created by saving an existing event's settings. This captures all field values, locations, and other details for reuse.
settings.createTemplateStep1: Go to the Events section and create or open an event
settings.createTemplateStep2: Configure the event with your desired settings
settings.createTemplateStep3: Use the "Save as Template" action to save it as a reusable template
settings.searchTemplates: Search templates by name or description...
settings.noTemplatesCreated: No templates have been created yet. Templates are saved from individual events.
settings.eventPresetsDescription: View and manage saved event presets. Presets store commonly used field values for quick event creation.
settings.searchPresets: Search presets by name or description...
settings.noPresetsCreated: No presets have been created yet. Presets are saved from individual events.
settings.deletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.errorLoadingSettings: There was an error loading your settings. Please try again later.
settings.massConfigurationDescription: Configure recurring Mass schedules, role assignments, and ministry volunteers.

massConfigurationHub.recurringScheduleDescription: Set up recurring Mass times for different days of the week.
massConfigurationHub.rolePatternsDescription: Define templates for role assignments at different types of Masses.
massConfigurationHub.roleDefinitionsDescription: Configure the liturgical roles available for Mass celebrations.
massConfigurationHub.volunteersDescription: View and manage people who serve in liturgical roles.

developerTools.title: Developer Tools
developerTools.description: Tools for development and testing purposes.

seedData.title: Seed Sample Data
seedData.description: Add sample data to your parish for testing and demonstration purposes.
seedData.info: This will create sample records including:

items.readings: Scripture readings for the content library

seedData.confirmDescription: This will add sample people, families, masses, and other records to your parish. This is useful for testing and demonstration. You can delete these records later if needed.

developerTools.seedError: Failed to seed sample data. Please try again.

eventTypes.title: Event Types
eventTypes.explanation: Event Types define the categories of events your parish can schedule. Create types for sacraments (Weddings, Baptisms, Funerals), parish activities (Bible Study, Youth Group), or any recurring event your parish needs.
eventTypes.examples: Examples: Wedding, Baptism, Funeral, Parish Meeting, Bible Study, Youth Group, RCIA Session
eventTypes.howItWorks: When you create an Event Type, you're defining a configuration that determines what information to collect and how to generate documents. You can add custom fields, configure settings, and create printable scripts. Every event created with this type will use these configurations.
eventTypes.dragToReorder: Drag to reorder how event types appear in menus.
eventTypes.noEventTypesMessage: Create an event type to start scheduling parish events. Event types define categories like "Wedding", "Funeral", "Bible Study", or any other recurring event your parish needs.
eventTypes.createDescription: Create a new event category for your parish
eventTypes.createExplanation: You're creating a new event category. After creation, you can add custom fields (like "Topic" or "Room Number") and configure scripts for printing.
eventTypes.namePlaceholder: e.g., Parish Meeting, Bible Study, Youth Group
eventTypes.nameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name. This will appear in dropdown menus when staff create new events.
eventTypes.iconHelp: Choose an icon to help visually identify this event type in lists and calendars.

hub.defaultDescription: Configure how events of this type are created and documented. Define what information to collect (custom fields) and how to generate printable ceremony documents (scripts).

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Define what data to collect for this event type (names, dates, locations, etc.)

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: Configure printable ceremony scripts for this special liturgy

fields.title: Custom Fields
fields.description: Define what data to collect for events of this type
fields.explanation: Custom fields define what data to collect for {eventTypeName}. These fields will appear on event creation forms.
fields.fieldsToPlaceholders: Fields you create here can be used as dynamic placeholders in your ceremony scripts. For example, a "Bride" field lets you insert {{bride.first_name}} in your script content.
fields.addFieldDescription: Add a new custom field to this event type
fields.noFields: No custom fields defined yet. Click Add Custom Field to get started.
fields.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {fieldName}? This action cannot be undone.

form.propertyNameHelp: Variable name used in scripts (lowercase, underscores only)
form.typeHelp: What type of data will this field store?
form.requiredHelp: Users must fill in this field when creating events
form.keyPersonHelp: Make this person field searchable in event lists
form.primaryHelp: Mark this as the main calendar event for this event type

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.explanation: Scripts define the structure and content of printable ceremony documents for {eventTypeName}. Create multiple scripts for different ceremony options.
scripts.autoGeneratedMessage: Scripts for {eventTypeName} are automatically generated from your custom fields in the order they were defined. No additional configuration needed.
scripts.noScripts: No scripts yet. Click Add Script to create one.
scripts.scriptNamePlaceholder: e.g., Full Wedding Ceremony, Simple Wedding
scripts.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {scriptName}? This will also delete all sections within this script. This action cannot be undone.

sections.title: Sections
sections.explanation: Sections are the building blocks of your script. Add sections for readings, prayers, ceremony text, and more. Use placeholders like '{{bride.first_name}}' to insert dynamic content.
sections.noSections: No sections yet. Click Add Section to build your script.
sections.contentPlaceholder: Enter the section content here. Use '{{placeholders}}' for dynamic data.
sections.contentHint: Use markdown formatting. Insert placeholders like '{{bride.first_name}}' for dynamic content.
sections.pageBreakHint: Insert a page break after this section when printing
sections.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {sectionName}? This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.title: Available Placeholders
placeholders.description: Click to copy a placeholder to your clipboard, then paste it into your section content.
placeholders.noFields: No custom fields defined yet. Add custom fields to use placeholders.

specialLiturgies.title: Special Liturgies
specialLiturgies.description: Manage special liturgical celebrations and sacraments
specialLiturgies.explanation: Special Liturgies include sacramental celebrations (Weddings, Baptisms, Funerals, Quinceañeras) and other liturgical celebrations like Benediction or Stations of the Cross. Create types for each liturgy your parish celebrates.
specialLiturgies.examples: Examples: Wedding, Baptism, Funeral, Quinceañera, Benediction, Stations of the Cross, Holy Hour
specialLiturgies.noSpecialLiturgiesMessage: Create a special liturgy type to start scheduling these celebrations. Special liturgies include sacramental celebrations and other liturgical events.
specialLiturgies.createDescription: Create a new special liturgy type
specialLiturgies.createExplanation: You're creating a new special liturgy type. After creation, you can add custom fields and configure scripts for printing.
specialLiturgies.nameHelp: Choose a clear, descriptive name for this special liturgy type.
specialLiturgies.iconHelp: Choose an icon to help visually identify this special liturgy type.
